<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Squawk!](/Feats.aspx?ID=5676) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You critically fail a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39), or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) check against a creature that doesn't have the [tengu](/Traits.aspx?ID=776) trait.

</column>

---

You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas. You get a failure on the triggering check, rather than a critical failure. All creatures that witnessed you Squawk are temporarily immune for 24 hours.
name: Squawk!
